definition: distorted and unnatural in shape or size, art characterized by an incongruous mixture of parts of humans and animals interwoven with plants
details:
adjective
- distorted and unnatural in shape or size
= synonyms: monstrous
- ludicrously odd
= synonyms: antic, fantastic, fantastical
noun
- art characterized by an incongruous mixture of parts of humans and animals interwoven with plants
